Title: Bloody Sunday
Overview: The dramatised story of the Irish civil rights protest march on January 30 1972 which ended in a massacre by British troops.
production_companies: Portman Entertainment Group, Bórd Scannán na hÉireann, Hell's Kitchen Films, Granada Television
Cast: James Nesbitt, Allan Gildea, Gerard Crossan
